tests.title: As a Admin the user should be able to see the bill me later request after clicking on appointment tab
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases As a Admin the user should be able to see the bill me later request after clicking on appointment tab

tests.title: At "Bill me later Requests" page each label and field should have proper label and validations
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases At "Bill me later Requests" page each label and field should have proper label and validations

tests.title: As a Admin the user can search the request with appointment id or patient name or provider name
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases As a Admin the user can search the request with appointment id or patient name or provider name

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the BML Requests list in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Appointment date" field of the table.
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases As a Admin the user can filter the BML Requests list in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Appointment date" field of the table.

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular BML Request.
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular BML Request.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can send an "Email" with a payment link by clicking on the "Send/Resend" button against that particular request
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases As a Admin the user can send an "Email" with a payment link by clicking on the "Send/Resend" button against that particular request

tests.title: As a Admin the user can Confirm the "Bill me later request"  by clicking on the "Confirm" button against that particular request
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases As a Admin the user can Confirm the "Bill me later request"  by clicking on the "Confirm" button against that particular request

tests.title: By clicking on the "confirm" button a confirmation modal will open.
tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases By clicking on the "confirm" button a confirmation modal will open.

tests.fullTitle: bill me later request testcases By clicking on the Confirm button the admin can approve the BML request
